title: Answering Your Questions
description: Got more questions? Send us your enquiry below

faqs.title: What area are you based in?
faqs.description: We primarily serve London and the surrounding areas, but depending on the project, we can travel further. Contact us to discuss your location and requirements.

faqs.title: How long does a typical project take?
faqs.description: Project timelines vary depending on size and complexity. We’ll provide an estimated schedule during your consultation and keep you updated throughout the process.

faqs.title: Do you offer free quotes?
faqs.description: Yes, we offer free, no-obligation quotes. Our team will visit your property, assess your needs, and provide a detailed breakdown.

faqs.title: Will I need planning permission for my project?
faqs.description: This depends on the type and scope of your project. We can guide you through local regulations and help with applications if needed.

faqs.title: Do you provide a guarantee for your work?
faqs.description: Absolutely. All of our work is backed by a guarantee for quality and durability, giving you peace of mind.

faqs.title: Can I stay in my home while the work is being done?
faqs.description: In most cases, yes—though it may depend on the scope of work and areas affected. We’ll discuss options to minimise disruption.

faqs.title: How do I get started with a project?
faqs.description: Simply get in touch with our team. We’ll arrange a consultation, discuss your ideas, and prepare a tailored plan and quote.
